Jasny\HttpMessage\UploadedFile::getErrorDescription

Retrieve the description of the error associated with the uploaded file.

If the file was uploaded successfully, this method returns null. This method is not part of PSR-7.

    Signature

    public function getErrorDescription()

    Returns

    string|null
